name: Automated RACH Root Sequence Allocation
summary: The Automated RACH Root Sequence Allocation feature removes the need for manually

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.rachRootSequence  EUtranCellTDD.rachRootSequence
parameters.description: First root sequence number for RACH preamble generation.  RACH root sequence is broadcast as a part of system information distribution and is                 used for preamble detection. For information on the definition of logical root                 sequence number, see 3GPP TS 36.211.  Taking effect depends on the feature state.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011246 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011246 MO instance.
